hero.title: Denis Adam

hero.name: Denis Adam
hero.slogan: Structure Teams, Optimize Performance, Inspire Growth.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a full stack developer with experience in modern web technologies.
about.texte:
With solid management experience, I spent 5 years at John Paul (luxury concierge company) leading a team of 7 concierges. During this period, I structured the team by implementing complete coaching, onboarding, continuous training, and personalized support processes, developing strong leadership and talent development skills.

Simultaneously, since 2018, I founded and run my digital marketing agency, MDMC Music Ads. We support over a hundred clients in strategic development and online fanbase engagement.

Our digital expertise has generated tangible results: over 1,500 campaigns launched, 34 million cumulative views, and solid engagement rates between 4% and 8%. My specialty: transforming interest into a loyal and active fan community.

Today, I put this dual expertise - managerial and digital -, data-driven and results-oriented, at the service of structuring your teams and growing your project.

tachfin.name: Tachfin Khelil
tachfin.title: Site Director at John Paul, Lisbon
tachfin.text: As the site director at John Paul in Lisbon, I had the pleasure of working with Denis ADAM, whose commitment, rigor, and versatility greatly contributed to the quality of our premium service. He was able to structure and strengthen our night concierge team, demonstrating a keen sense of crisis management and customer experience. Proactive, resilient, and always solution-oriented, Denis earned the trust of both clients and colleagues. I highly recommend him for any position requiring leadership, adaptability, and excellence in relationships.

customer_feedback.title: Customer Feedback
customer_feedback.fraud:
Credit Card Fraud Incident:
"Manager Denis ADAM demonstrated exemplary professionalism; his team responded to all our requests. We are delighted with the quality of service provided."
customer_feedback.mbappe:
Mbapp√© Signed T-shirt:
"A big thank you to you, Denis, and Jade for your fantastic work. For a first attempt, it's a great success for me. Please pass the word to the whole team, I will be sending an email to this effect."
customer_feedback.covid:
Assistance During the Covid Crisis Abroad:
"I wanted to express how much I appreciate your kindness. I would like to express my deepest gratitude because I have already been in touch with the French embassy in Cuba and then I got the doctor, and the insurance doctor. I was touched by your responsiveness, your compassion, and your empathy."
